en: :panda_face: Hi! This is a tipbot for Pandacoin.
You can use it to share pandas with your friends.
This bot allows you to receive, store and send pandacoins on Telegram.
:moneybag: To get started, create a deposit address or ask a friend to send you some pandas.
Use /deposit or /address _in private_ to know your own address on the bot.
Then you can send funds to that address the same way as you usually transfer funds with your PandaBank.
Use /balance _in private_ to know how much Pandacoin you have got in your account.
:person_tipping_hand: Once you have some pandas, share them with your friends.
Use `/tip <user> <amount>`
Make sure to correctly tag your the person you are tipping.
:globe_with_meridians: Need to withdraw to your PandaBank?
Use `/withdraw <address> <amount>`
Please double check your address before submitting, as we cannot undo that process.
Need more advanced help and usage tricks?
Click the button bellow:
:gear: Advanced help.
